name: Blade and Ham
description:
Blade & Ham is a classic 2.5D beat'em up set in a fantasy world.

After ages of epic battles, blood and violence, wars and wonders... Heroes built a cozy tavern, for quiet life in ale and beer. But once, some one killed their dog...

Features

  • Characters
6 unique heroes with different stats, movements and special attacks.

  • Knurs
A magic creatures who helps you with healing, magic and even force.

  • Global Map
Explore the world and track down the bastard!
